known_issues: Police interface does not reliably show ambulance location; ambulance may not appear or location is inaccurate, making it hard to find.

existing_features.title: Ensure the police interface reliably shows ambulances on the map and in the list even when they are outside the configured radius, by adding a police-authorized backend query that returns all current ambulance locations and wiring the police UI to use it (with optional radius filtering as a client-side view filter).

Improve police-side visibility of stale/paused ambulance updates: do not hide ambulances purely because their last update is older than the current timeout; instead, keep them visible and clearly label them as “Offline / Last update: Xs ago”, and provide a UI toggle to hide/show offline ambulances.

Fix incorrect ambulance-to-contact association in the police interface by matching ambulance contacts by ambulanceId (principal) rather than by array index, so the displayed contact name/phone corresponds to the correct ambulance marker and list item.

projectName: Fix police interface to reliably display accurate ambulance locations
